charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE- SELL DISTRIBUTE OR DISPENSE, 21:846=CD.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE, 18:1951.F INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE, 18:924C.F VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/GUN
21:846=CD.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE AND POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE ONE KILOGRAM AND MORE OF HEROIN AND FIVE KILOGRAMS AND MORE OF COCAINE(1)
18:1951.F INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE (HOBBS ACT ROBBERY)(2)
18:924C.F CARRYING AND USING A FIREARM DURING AND IN RELATION TO, AND POSSESSING A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF, A DRUG TRAFFICKING OFFENSE(3)

21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL DISTRIBUTE OR DISPENSE , 21:846=CD.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE, 18:1951.F  INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE, 18:924C.F, VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/GUN
18:1951.F INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE (HOBBS ACT ROBBERY)(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 1 day on count 2, and 60 months on count 3, to run consecutively. Supervised Release: 2 years on count 1 and count 2, to run concurrently.
